title: Crusty Italian bread
ingredients: ['500g plain flour', '1 tablespoon light brown soft sugar', '315ml warm water (45 degrees C)', '1 1/2 teaspoons salt', '1 1/2 teaspoons olive oil', '1 (7g) sachet dried active baking yeast', '1 egg', '1 tablespoon water', '2 tablespoons dry polenta or cornmeal']
